typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	CorpusContainer as string,
	CorpusFolderPath as string,
	Entity as string,
	RootContainer as string,
	RootFolderPath as string,
	EntityPath as string,
	ManifestName as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		JournalName as string,
		JournalBatchNumber as string,
		LineNumber as string,
		AccountName as string,
		AccountType as string,
		CreditAmount as string,
		DebitAmount as string,
		Currency as string,
		ExchangeRate as string,
		Description as string,
		Invoice as string,
		IsPosted as string,
		PostedDate as string,
		PostingLayer as string,
		OffsetAccountName as string,
		OffsetAccountType as string,
		PaymentMethod as string,
		PaymentDate as string
	),
	entity: 'GeneralJournal.cdm.json/GeneralJournal',
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestType: 'manifest',
	manifestName: 'GeneralLedger',
	folderPath: 'data',
	fileSystem: 'models',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true,
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	corpusPath: 'cdm',
	corpusStore: 'adlsgen2',
	adlsgen2_fileSystem: 'models',
	truncate: true,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
